name: btsync
long_description:
WIP
---

Please see github repository location for WIP updates and general description and usage.

Description
-----------

This _Chef_ cookbook installs and configures [_BittorrentSync_](http://www.bittorrent.com/sync)
 on a Linux compatible operating system.

The cookbook downloads the _btsync_ for i386 / x86_64 architectures via the btsync latest downloads site. 
unpacks and moves it to the directory you have specified in the node configuration (`/usr/local/bin/` by default).

It installs a service which enables you to start, stop, restart and check status of the _btsync_ process.


Repository
----------

https://github.com/Nitecon/btsync
